Welcome to Quinnipiac University! 

This navigation app contains a comprehensive map of all three campuses 

In the left menu there is a filter for the different pins and the ability to navigate between the different campuses 

The main campus is Mount Carmel Campus where you'll find your new home away from home. The picturesque quad at the foothills of the Sleeping Giant Mountain is where many students first fall in love with our university. 

The York Hill Campus includes the Rocky Top Student Center, M&T Bank Arena and upperclass residence halls. Featuring a fitness center, dining hall, meeting spaces and a 2-story stone fireplace located at the social heart of the building, it is a great place to both unwind and be productive.
